edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.audio

Class SpectrogramPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.audio.SpectrogramPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SpectrogramPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Converts a set of log magnitude Spectrum data into a graphical representation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • computeSpectrogram

        protected void computeSpectrogram()
        Actually creates the Spectrogram image.

      • setOffsetFactor

        public void setOffsetFactor(double offsetFactor)
        Updates the offset factor used to calculate the greyscale values from the intensities. This also calculates and populates all the greyscale values in the image.
        Parameters:
        offsetFactor - the offset factor used to calculate the greyscale values from the intensities; this is used to adjust the level of background noise that shows up in the image

      • zoomSet

        protected void zoomSet(float zoom)
        Zoom the image, preparing for new display.
        Parameters:
        zoom - a zoom to set
